text: Kayılar, senin nasıl bir gazap ateşi olduğunu görecekler
english: The apricots will see what a fire of wrath you are.
The Sultan, whose only savior you are
I'm afraid his fever won't stop.

text: dua etmekten başka hiçbirimizin yapacağı bir şey yok
english: There's nothing any of us can do but pray.
He wants us all to be at work.
We all know what we're doing.
Don't let him see what we're missing.

text: Halep'e kadar çok uzun yolumuz var
english: It's a long way to Aleppo.
And none of us will give up
Thank you, grandson of my prim.
My Lord will grant us their intercession.
Your grandfather ordered a place of paradise.
Each bird flies with its own kind
Aleppo, there's been quite a crowd.

text: Kartallar bir başı tutmuş kargalar bir başı
english: Eagles with a head and crows with a head
They're all worried about something else.

text: Kimisi aşının peşinde haram helal demeden
english: Some are after the vaccine without saying it's forbidden
Some are looking forward to the future.

text: Allah'ın bu işte rızası var mı yok mu düşünmeden
english: I don't know if God's pleasure is in this.
If they have a reckoning, if they have a trap
Indeed Allah is the All-beneficent, the All-beneficent.
It's not just for your husband anymore.

text: Ertuğrul'la beraber uzun bir yol bekler bizi
english: Ertugrul and I have a long journey ahead of us.
And we can't wait to go.

text: hem de bu yol, ömrümün en zor yolu olacak
english: And this road will be the hardest way of my life.
Our king of Solomon is not well.
He roamed the land of the reaper.

text: Ölüm döşeğinde zamanının dolmasını bekler derler
english: They say he waits for his time on his deathbed
We've been a burden to Solomon Shah
Mr. Gündüz is going to Aleppo.
He said he'll take you to Halima.
Tie 'em tight We've got a tough road
You'll be surprised to hear what I have to say
The one that got us in trouble.

text: dert üstüne dert eklemekten başka işe yaramayan misafirlerimizin
english: Our guests, who have no use but to add trouble to their troubles.

text: neden bu kadar değerli olduğu belli oldu

english: The Numan who introduced me as a merchant.
Turns out he's a Seljuk prince.

text: bana söylemekteki amacın nedir Selcan Hatun?
english: What is your purpose in telling me, Selcan Hatun?

text: Küçük bir bilgi kırıntısıyla neler yapabileceğini gördüm Kurdoğlu
english: I've seen what you can do with a little bit of information, Kurdoglu.

text: O vakitler ikisi de bizim yaşlarımızdaymış
english: They were both our age at the time.
Uncle Kurdoğlu fell off a horse
Did something happen to the horse?

text: Çünkü karşılarına kocaman bir ayı çıkmış
english: 'Cause there's a big bear in front of them.
Just when he was going to tear up my uncle
My father came and killed the bear with his spear.

text: İşte o vakit kan kardeşi olmuşlar
english: That's when they became blood brothers.

text: Gittiğinizde Kayı obasında bir kardeşin olduğunu sakın unutma
english: When you leave, don't forget that you have a brother in the area of Alyi.
I'm the one who gave the secret to Lokman Doctor.
You protect us from the unresolved woes
I'm gonna go to El Aziz right now.

text: şu Kayıların sınırlarımıza yerleşmesine engel olmasını söyle
english: Tell him to stop those apricots from settling down on our borders.

text: Titus'un aptallıkları üstüne konuşup vakit kaybedemem
english: I can't waste time talking about Titus' stupidity.

text: kendini vezir zanneden bir piyondan ibaret
english: He's just a pawn who thinks he's a queen.

text: El Aziz'i kararından caydırmak çok zor
english: It's hard to talk El Aziz out of it.
Al Aziz's love for the apricots

text: veba mikrobu bulaştırmayı göze alacak kadar çok mu?
english: Enough to risk infecting the plague?
The spies who came to kill Ertugrul
Did you find out who sent it?

text: Aldığım bilgilere göre Tapınakçılar her yerde casuslarını harekete geçirmiş
english: According to my information, the Templars have mobilized their spies everywhere.
I'm trying to figure out your contacts in the palace.
I didn't want to wait till morning.

text: Muhaberat Anadolu'nun vebadan kırıldığını bildirir dururdu
english: Communications used to say that Asia Minor was broken by the plague.

text: Ben de emin olmak için müstakbel müttefiklerimiz
english: I, too, will be our future allies to make sure.

text: bu illete bulaşmış mı bulaşmamış mı öğrenmek istedim
english: I wanted to know if he was infected or not.
I know you love the apricots.

text: sınırımızı tutmak için biçilmiş kaftan olduklarına ben de inanıyorum
english: I believe they're perfect for keeping our limits.
Unfortunately, many of his animals have been destroyed.
Don't bring the apricots back from the border, Nasser.
I'd like to speak to Ertugrul myself.
All the gentlemen gathered in the tent.
Don't talk like my father's dead, Kurdoglu.
As much as you are your father's son
You're the son of the oban. Rise and shine.
When the Oban was in a state of doubt

text: böyle avratlar gibi çadırında mı oturacaksın?
english: Are you going to sit in your tent like this?

text: Yayladan düzlüğe indikçe müşkül ortadan kalkar
english: As you go from the bow to the plain, the suspense is gone.
My dad's gonna be fine, too.
I have nothing more to say Kurdoğlu
Do you know you'll meet him at dawn?
What are you trying to say?

text: bu gittiğimiz yol, yol değildir evlat
english: That's not the way we're going, son.

text: Toyun kararı, babamın da emri var
english: It's a decision, my father's orders.
I have nothing more to say than that, Kurdoglu.

text: Sanır mısın ki o vekâlette gözüm var?
english: Do you think I have an eye for that power of attorney?
I'd like to crawl under your father's shadow?

text: babam artık kocadı ondan beylik çıkmaz diye
english: My father's a husband now, in case he doesn't grow up to be a gentleman.
Because I got your back to the end, huh?
I'm an old man in a ditch
Your Oban is brave like you.

text: ne istediğini bilen bir beye ihtiyacı olduğunu sana defalarca söyledim
english: I've told you many times he needs a gentleman who knows what he wants.
I'm gonna get you out of this mess.

text: bey yapana kadar bana güvenmeni isterim
english: I want you to trust me until the gentleman does.
The evil that Ertuğrul has brought upon us
I also found out who the guests are.
That Numan and his son are from the Seljuk Dynasty

text: Kim olduğu belirsiz o insanlar dediklerin var ya
english: You know those people you call anonymous?

text: Ya, Numan denilen o herif şehzade
english: Yeah, that guy Numan is a prince.

text: o hakir gördüğün kız da sultan
english: And the girl you despise is the Sultan.
The sultan cares for the oba.

text: Selçuklu topraklarındaki en güzel yerlere kuruluruz
english: We're set up in the best places on Seljuk land.
What do you want from me, Kurdoglu?
Aleppo will be a disaster for all of us.
And let's give it to Sultan. It's daylight.
May he grant you to us, to the apricots.
